'Morgan Advanced Ceramics (MAC)' is a subsidiary of The Morgan Crucible Company
plc, MAC forms part of the Morgan Technical Ceramics (MTC) group. The group
also includes Morgan Electro Ceramics (MEC) and from manufacturing locations in
North America, Europe and Asia, an extensive range of products, including
ceramic components; braze alloys; ceramic/metal assemblies and engineered
coatings are supplied.
